attributes.action: Resign his office and call an immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government under gordon brown is incompetant and unfit to govern this fine country. Examples include
1) loss of 25 million personal records
2) loss of Billions supporting northern rock unsustainable business model. 
3) Ever increaing taxes for worse services
4) Unending attacks on civil liberties 
5) The so called miracle economy which was built on nothing more than house price inflation and cheap easy credit. Which will lead to a recession.
6) Death of the UK manufacturing and engineering sector. 
7) No referendum (although promised) on the EU constitution / treaty
8) Chronic underfunding of the armed forces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
